derivation: from G3844 (πάρειμι) and G1510 (πάρειμι) (including its various forms);
kjv_def: come, X have, be here, + lack, (be here) present
strongs_def: to be near, i.e. at hand; neuter present participle (singular) time being, or (plural) property
outline:
1. to be by, be at hand, to have arrived, to be present
  2. to be ready, in store, at command
